venue.name: The Egg
venue.booth: Our booth is located in the main hall. Come say hi!

bounties.name: 🚀 Best app integrating ERC-7579 Safe Smart Accounts
bounties.description: Build an application that supports Safe accounts v1.4.1, integrates Pimlico's permissionless.js, Rhinestone's ModuleKit, and uses the Safe7579Adapter.

bounties.name: 🔑 Best app integrating Passkeys with the Safe Smart Account
bounties.description: Build an application that integrates Passkeys using the Safe{Core} SDK.

bounties.name: 🃏 Best app integrating Safe (wildcard)
bounties.description: Build any useful application with Safe users in mind. There are no limitations on the idea or technologies used.

workshops.title: Integrating Passkeys with the Safe Smart Account
workshops.speaker: Germán Martinez
